title: Pre-authorization Requirements
content: All high-value procedures (>â‚¹50,000) require pre-authorization within 48 hours of admission. Submit complete documentation including medical history, diagnostic reports, and treatment plan.

title: Eligibility Verification
content: Patient eligibility must be verified against empanelment database before treatment initiation. Real-time verification is mandatory for all procedures.

title: Documentation Standards
content: All medical records must be maintained in digital format with proper timestamps. Handwritten notes must be digitized within 24 hours.

title: Emergency Procedures Protocol
content: Emergency procedures can be initiated without pre-authorization. Post-procedure documentation must be submitted within 72 hours.

title: Quality Assurance Standards
content: All empaneled hospitals must maintain minimum quality standards. Regular audits will be conducted to ensure compliance.
